biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  Steve Bastoni (born 4 March 1966) is an Italian Australian actor. He is best known for his role in Police Rescue as Constable Yannis 'Angel' Angelopoulos and as Steve Parker in Neighbours.
